intro: Episcia duidae, commonly known as the velvet leaf. It is a member of the Gesneriaceae family and is native to the tropical regions of South America. The plant is characterized by its striking, velvety leaves that range in color from deep green to purple. It produces small, tubular flowers that are typically red or orange in color. Episcia duidae is often cultivated as a decorative houseplant due to its ornamental foliage and ease of care.
